plugins.name: story-alchemist
plugins.description: Transform PowerPoint presentations with AI-powered story structure and aesthetic design analysis. Includes two complementary skills: TaleTuner for narrative analysis and Aura Sense for aesthetic critique.

commands.name: taletuner
commands.description: Analyzes presentation story structure, narrative flow, and coherence. Provides creative scoring and actionable tips to enhance storytelling.

commands.name: aurasense
commands.description: Evaluates presentation design, emotional vibe, and visual personality. Delivers creative aura ratings and specific aesthetic improvements.

platforms.windows: Full support for .pptx, .ppt, and .pdf with PowerPoint installed
platforms.macos: Supports .pptx and .pdf formats. Legacy .ppt requires conversion.
platforms.linux: Supports .pptx and .pdf formats. Legacy .ppt requires conversion.
